subject: Technical Requirements Discussion
description: Discussed integration requirements and timeline with John Smith. He mentioned need for API documentation.

subject: Product Demo - Inventory Management
description: Conducted comprehensive demo of inventory management features. Sarah was impressed with real-time reporting capabilities.

subject: Contract Signed - Welcome Package
description: Sent welcome package and implementation timeline. Contract officially signed and executed.

subject: Technical Integration Planning
description: Follow-up call with IT Director Lisa Anderson to discuss technical implementation details and integration timeline.

subject: Executive Presentation Prep
description: Strategy meeting with Robert Taylor to prepare for board presentation. Reviewed ROI calculations and implementation roadmap.

subject: Proposal Follow-up
description: Sent detailed proposal with pricing and implementation timeline. Requested feedback by end of week.

subject: Pricing Discussion
description: Negotiated pricing for multi-location deployment. Discussed volume discounts and payment terms.
